Package hr.fer.zemris.java.custom.scripting.demo

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SmartScriptEngineDemo
    Demonstrates the use of SmartScriptEngine, takes one argument (file path) as command line argument, parses it using SmartScriptParser and then executes it using SmartScriptEngine and writes the result to standard output.
    TreeWriter
    The program accepts a file name as a command line argument, opens the smart script file, parses it into a tree using SmartScriptParser and then reproduces it into original form using INodeVisitor and writes it out to the standard output.
